replies.body: Who else bought sona just for this skin?
Some of us are just long time Sona players excited about this skin.
I'm a long time Sona player who can't wait for the hype of this skin to drop off. So many bad Sona's. It hurts (the laughing, that is).
Sona was the one who got me hooked on support! She amazing, BUT I HAVE NO MONEY!!! {{champion:37}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:37}} !!! *cries to death*
Who else uses their  lunch money just for this skin?
Yes to both of you. I bought the RP with a subway gift card
We can pay with subway gift cards?
I have owned and loved {{champion:37}} since season 2. Come join us in supporting my friends. Sona love forever!
And on this day, bot lanes everywhere were lost due to bad sonas
And on this day, bot lanes everywhere were lost due dropped bass
I'm pretty sure those are just average Sonas, her herself as a champion is just bad.  We have Fearless to thank for killing her.

There are only a few champions in the game that are truely bad, and Sona is definitely not one of them. She is not as strong as she used to be, with the limitations to her auras and all, but she still brings a lot of utility to the team.

...and here kids, we have a perfect example of the reason Lee Sin and Zed will never get nerfed.  This is a prime specimen of the community's toxic player base, who blindly worship Riot without question or reason.

I fully agree. We have champs like Lee, Zed, Nasus, etc. who need nerfs. Do they get them? Nah, of corse not. Every game has that OP guy. League has those many OP people who can solo all day long, then go take Baron and seal the game...

What about Riven...
Or Satan? I mean Teemo*
Or nah~
Prepare for downvotes O.o

DROP

THE 

BEAT
And that was the day Riot made a billion dollars

You seem to have forgotten that she died in patch 4.13.  Over half of the players that would have bought her if that didn't happen, will not.  Considering they said yesterday that the returns on ultimate skins are low, I'm almost certain they're losing **A LOT** of profit because of Fearless' actions.

I'm torn. I was a Sona main before 4.13, and I hate what they did to her. I haven't played her nearly as much since.
On the other hand, this is a sexy as hell skin, and I REALLY don't want to change my mind later and have to pay full price.
But then again, 25% isn't as great of a reduction as usual. It might be worth holding on to the RP anyway.
Honestly I'm glad to hear that.
I know Ao Shin is somewhere in that background and I'm not stopping until I find him

The poster on the launcher says DJ Sona's concert is $15 admission.

This certainly isn't $15...

Maybe you should change the poster?
DJ SONA MADE MY FPS GO DOWN HARD :(

So why is this ultimate 2450 RP for its initial sale on release?
Spirit Guard {{champion:77}} was 1950 Rp on the initial release a year ago (http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3666574)
Even Pulse Fire {{champion:81}} was only 1625 RP for its initial release 2 years ago (http://promo.leagueoflegends.com/pulsefire-ezreal/en.html).
Why are ultimate skins costing more and more every year during the initial "sale" on release?
They are costing more and more to make. This skin is basically three in one, after all
Udyrs skin was like 9 skins in one. One for his base skin without using an ability the 4 bases and then the 4 fully leveled versions.
This took 3 years to create i think its worth..
They are all "ultimate" skins though they all meet the same standards for an "ultimate" skin, why should the discounts keep being less and less?
rito isnt hurting for money. if they are going to establish a tier system they may as well adhere to it
Mostly due to inflation. Just ask {{champion:154}} .
Because they keep getting better and better. Don't complain, at least they are offering the sale.

If you have a negative opinion or a concern, then don't ever bring it up, especially here.  The only thing we want are positive comments, shilling, and happy thoughts.

That guy has every right to complain.

I agree with you. I set aside 1950 RP to buy this the second it came out. When i saw the new more expensive price I was pretty disappointed. I wont be spending the extra 500 RP. Sucks because i'm missing out on an awesome skin.
2450 lol no thanks
Dang this is cool, I was thinking of getting arcade but now... :)
I had arcade already, now I don't like it as much
i have pentakill, silent night, and guqin, i don't like them as much
who else thought vocaloid concert
Copyright issues.
{{champion:37}}  the dj skin for her is way to expensive
Poop
TeamBuilder support queue time? Over 9000xxxxx
Aaaaand there goes my wallet.
call me ignorant, but who is Fearless? I keep seeing his name come up in comments
he is the rioter that nerved sons in patch 4.13
This came out on my birthday and I've had this name for a while now. Coincidence? {{champion:37}}

Too bad I can't enjoy this, thanks for ruining League, Fearless.  I'm certain you'll continue to lose Riot more profit with your existence.

**#BetterNerfSona #FireFearless #SaveSona2015**
Can we get a legendary skin for {{champion:89}} now?
meh i dont think ill buy it, i dont play sona enough to get my moneys worth. Good Looking Skin Doe
